name: AstralVinery
description:
Similarly to the Jet Suit Additions mod, this mod is intended to be part of the Create: Astral modpack. 

In the future it may add more features, e.g. more sorts of wine, however right now this is just a bugfix that allows us to use Vinery blocks in structure generation and also fixes the game crashing when trying to place a Vinery block with a Create schematicannon. 

As it is intended to be part of a modpack, the minecraft version in use will match the modpack. Right now this means Fabric 1.18.2.
